titles.title: Honoring Kikkoman Foods, Inc. and its 50 years of commitment to providing quality products to the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 9/7/2007--Introduced. Recognizes the contribution of Kikkoman Food, Inc. to the economic vitality of the United States. Celebrates the company's 50 years of U.S. marketing and operations.
